where is parking: Parking is available near the main gate of The American College, Tallakulam campus.
is parking available: Yes, parking facilities are available for students and staff.
where is library: The library is located inside the main academic block of the college.
where is canteen: The canteen is located near the student activity area.
college timing: The college usually functions from 8:00 AM to 4:30 PM on working days.
is wifi available: Yes, Wi-Fi facilities are available for students on campus.
parking: Parking is available near the main gate of The American College
what ug courses are offered: UG courses include B.A, B.Sc, B.Com, BBA, and BCA.
what pg courses are offered: PG courses include M.A, M.Sc, M.Com, MBA, and MCA.
is mba available: Yes, MBA is offered as a postgraduate program.
is computer science available: Yes, Computer Science is offered at UG and PG levels.
is biotechnology available: Yes, Biotechnology is offered as a UG and PG program.
who is the principal of american college: The principal is Dr. J. Paul Jayakar, M.A., M.Phil., Ph.D.
what is the nirf ranking of american col: The college was ranked 59 among colleges in India in NIRF 2025.
what are major departments: Departments include Humanities, Sciences, Commerce, Computer Science, Management and others.
does american college have hostel: Yes, hostel facilities are available on campus for students.
is hostel available: Yes, hostel facilities are available. Please contact the college office for details.
